MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G82 postcode area of Dumbarton. It IS necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:50am to progress with repairs to a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:26am on the 6th of November 2020.
